features: Contains 2 naturally friendly hello sage + eucalyptus deodorants - clinically proven 24-hour odor protection with shea butter to soothe and moisturize. featuring a gender neutral, trend driven, thoughtfully created formula. apply to your underarms only. take a whiff. smile. you got this.

aluminum-free, formulated not to stain: block odor, not sweat with hello aluminum-free deodorants. aluminum, the cause of stains, is added to some deodorants to prevent sweating.hello aluminum-free deodorants provide all day friendliness to fight stinky without staining, anything less would be the pits

naturally friendly deodorant: goodbye stinky, hello naturally friendly deodorant. no baking soda, no parabens, no talcs, no dyes. all hello products are cruelty-free, vegan, and free from dyes, artificial fragrances, parabens, and gluten. #choosefriendly

non-sticky, non-greasy, glides easily: thoughtfully crafted with a base of natural oils and waxes including tea tree oil, arrowroot, rice bran wax, shea butter and cocoa butter to glide on easily, soothe, and moisturize for super-amaze skin feel.
made from 100% recycled packaging material: hello planet, let’s be friends. made from 100% previously recycled packaging and 100% recyclable all over again.
body.description: Say hello to sage + eucalyptus deodorant with natural fragrance. Thoughtfully created in 100% previously recycled packaging, this lively deo smells great and provides all day friendliness to fight the stink, soothe and moisturize. Anything less would be the pits. But buckle-up, there's more goodness: this deodorant is aluminum free, baking soda free, parabens free, phthalates free, talc free, and dyes free. As if that weren't enough magic, hello is vegan, cruelty free, never tested on animals (Leaping Bunny Certified and PETA recognized). Choose friendly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have tried other deodorants and none have compared to Hello. I used to use antiperspirants but stopped because of the Aluminum in them is bad. I like that this deodorant has all natural ingredients and the smell is nice and clean, not overpowering. It works well. I have found my new deodorant for life. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smell is nice without being too much like perfume. Not wet/slimy at all. I don’t think it prevents sweating (Not anti perspirant, but that’s the point). No harsh metals. My skin won’t tolerate baking soda, and this doesn’t have any in the ingredients, so no rash. seems to last most of the day. I’ve paid for very expensive deodorants to accommodate my skin and this works just as well for half the cost

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A little rough to put on. Smells great and lasts a majority of the day. On workout days you may need to re-apply. Not bad though

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Didn't work for me, but smells nice
reviews.reviewText: So I don't use antiperspirant because I have sensitive armpits (and skin in general). This deodorant looked good to me cause it doesn't have any irritants and I love the smell of eucalyptus.Unfortunately, it did not deodorize me at all. It would make me smell nice for maybe an hour, but then my odor would come through pretty quick. Now, I think this product is mostly advertised towards women. I'm a man, so I'm probably stinkier than the average woman lol. I usually use men's dove deodorant (eucalyptus scent, of course!). But I wanted to see what this was like. If you're a man looking to get this, or a woman who may be a bit smellier in the pits, this may not work well for you.Also I have a lot of armpit hair, and it pulled on my hair while applying which was kinda uncomfortable. Something about the texture is more abrasive than other deodorants I've used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Scent free all day
reviews.reviewText: Very pleased with this deodorant! I have tried the currently overly advertised popular deodorant, and that was good but not as good as they claim and is outrageously expensive. This stuff works just as well if not better. I can go out all day, work in the yard in the sun, and still smell fresh as a daisy. No rash, either, which I have gotten from some natural deodorants. You should give it a try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Okay, I understand that deodorant is to keep you dry but this is so dry it became painful from the rubbing. Smells good but it need a little moisture as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t irritate my pitch.
reviews.reviewText: So many deodorant sticks leave me with blotch itchy spots, but not these. Really lasts the day. Smell great. Doesn’t appear to stain clothes. No blotchy itchy rash, as so many other deodorants produce. Several nice scents to pick, they have an unscented also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Honest review - Would NOT buy again
reviews.reviewText: In summary: This deodorant ultimately failed to meet my expectations regarding scent and deodorizing ability. Waxy texture. Pulls your skin with it with each swipe. I like the lack of distasteful ingredients.I wanted to switch to an aluminum free deodorant. This brand seemed just right. I was excited for the sage & eucalyptus scent, even though it’s a couple dollars more.I purchased the product several weeks ago and have been using it daily. The first thing I notice is the scent of course… I LOVE herbal aromatics that are pleasant, non-spicy, and earthy.…What I come to realize is that this deodorant smells like a lemon.. I have grown up with eucalyptus trees all my life; the scent of their leaves is amazing to me. This deodorant is nothing like that OR sage. It should be advertised as a citrus scent or even a lemon bar food.. I hate to use food scents for cosmetics.My point here is: the scent is extremely disappointing and incorrect.Well, I can’t return a used deodorant, so I have to stick with it. Through that, I notice just how mediocre this deodorant is at executing its purpose to deodorize. For around the house, I don’t notice any body odor. What I also don’t like is the fact that I can’t smell the deodorant at all after an hour of use. I guess that’s a good thing because I don’t like the smell of it anyway..Now, after an 8 hour shift, if I check myself I can detect a faint body odor. It’s only so bad that someone would have to shove their face into my armpits to be able to smell it. Still, that fact is VERY disappointing when I realize my previous deodorant never did that to me.My point with this is: the deodorant definitely does NOT offer 24HR protection as it states on the label. Maybe I have to absolutely CAKE my armpits with it to achieve 24HR protection. However, with such a waxy texture, why would I want to do that?? I am never using more than 7 swipes from a deodorant to get good protection. I guess that isn’t enough from this brand.I can understand that it may be difficult to create a super-deodorizing deodorant that truly offers 24hr/48hr protection without common ingredients. Nonetheless, I am disappointed. Maybe asking for an aluminum free deodorant that deodorizes is too much from the Hello brand. Then again, $16? Um.. okay..I doubt I can return a USED deodorant, so now I’m stuck with $16 wasted. Choose this deodorant if you have really small sweat/odor output and you like lemon bars. Will not buy again.. Very disappointed.. Gonna switch to Native and see how better off their deodorant works.
Smells amazing and does its job. A bit difficult to roll on but using moisturiser(like coconut oil) first then using the product solves the problem.
